publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1090.1 Michael Matheson: Protecting Communities - Reforming the Role of Non-Jury Courts-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1090) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, leave out from "considers" to end and insert "supports the need to have a fair, effective and efficient summary criminal justice system; welcomes the recent report by Sheriff Principal McInnes; acknowledges the note of dissent within the report, and believes that future changes to the summary justice system must impart confidence to everyone: victims, witnesses, accused persons, court users and, above all, the communities they serve.
